SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.vehiclerental.dto

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.vehiclerental.dto.Vehicle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bike, Car
public class Vehicle extends Object
The Vehicle class serves as a base class representing a generic vehicle with attributes such as brand, model, and rental price per day.

It provides constructors to initialize vehicle details and methods to input and display those details. This class is intended to be extended by more specific vehicle types like Car and Bike.

Author:
Joel Georgie

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vehicle()
    Default constructor that initializes brand and model to null and rental price per day to 0.0.
    Vehicle(String brand, String model, double rentalPricePerDay)
    Parameterized constructor to initialize a vehicle with specific details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle()
      Default constructor that initializes brand and model to null and rental price per day to 0.0.

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(String brand, String model, double rentalPricePerDay)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize a vehicle with specific details.
      Parameters:
      brand - the brand of the vehicle
      model - the model of the vehicle
      rentalPricePerDay - the rental cost per day for the vehicle

  • Method Details

    • inputDetails

      public void inputDetails()
      Prompts the user to input details for the vehicle (brand, model, and rental price). Uses a Scanner to read from standard input.

    • displayDetails

      public void displayDetails()
      Displays the vehicle's brand, model, and rental price per day.
